meals.name: Roti Canai
meals.description: Malaysian flatbread that is typically served with curry or dal

meals.name: Satay
meals.description: Skewered and grilled meat, usually chicken or beef, served with peanut sauce

meals.name: Curry Laksa
meals.description: Noodle dish, a curry broth made withs and herbs coconut milk, along with various spice

meals.name: Nasi Dagang
meals.description: Glutinous rice, steamed in coconut milk and served with side dishes

meals.name: Keropok Lekor
meals.description: Fish snack made from a mixture of fish, sago flour, and salt, boiled or deep-fried

meals.name: Cendol
meals.description: An iced sweet dessert contains droplets of rice flour jelly, coconut milk and palm sugar syrup
